snippet.title: Santa Present Defense - Official Gameplay Trailer (48 hours development version)
snippet.description:
Santa Present Defense is a Christmas Special Project developed in under 48h!
Santa crashed into the woods while transporting his presents. Defend them from crazy christmas elves. Throw your snowballs and smash them all.❄️

🎁Merry Christmas everyone!🎁

🎅Download Santa Present Defense for free: http://bit.ly/SantaPresentDefense

Choose your Membership Level and get exclusive benefits from the Channel!
🥇 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/gamedevel

Or buy me a fine cup of coffee to boost my motivation (need caffeine!)
☕ https://www.buymeacoffee.com/SavvuGameDevel

Thank you :D

A full devlog video from the making of "Santa Present Defense" will be available very soon on my Channel. Stay tuned and keep on playing!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
👋 Discord: https://discord.gg/Y94dNVFJmD

🔔 Don't click here!: http://bit.ly/savvulink

💚 GooglePlay: http://bit.ly/SAVVUgamepage
💛 Itch.io: https://savvu-games.itch.io

🌐 Website: https://savvugames.com
💜 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/savvugames/
💙 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/savvugames
🖤 Twitter: https://twitter.com/savvugames

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#savvu #santapresentdefense #gameplaytrailer #gamedevelopment #unity2D #indiedeveloper
